Topic.Title: Get ready - Alibaba IPO announcement anyday!!

Message.Msg: I think that's the basis of the lawsuit. They are alleging that the dish proposal is not a better offer and that dish is simply meddling in the deal by sprint to prevent them from completing a tender for a company which they already own more than 50%. With both direct and dish trying to buy into new businesses not sure if its true. But, what would dish really do with minority interest in clear wire but mess with sprint. It would be an adversarial relationship from the start
